Headline: #74 Fullerton Temporary Reroute at Fullerton/Monticello
ShortDescription: 74 Fullerton buses are temporarily rerouted via Fullerton, Pulaski, Armitage, Central Park & Fullerton, due to street blockage near Fullerton/Monticello.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#74 Fullerton buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Fullerton, Pulaski, Armitage, Central Park, then resume their normal route at Fullerton, due to street blockage near Fullerton/Monticello.

Allow extra travel time.

ShortDescription: 15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, Drexel, 47th, Lake Park and 51st, due to street blockage near Hyde Park Blvd/Kimbark.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#15 Jeffery Local  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 51st, Drexel, 47th, Lake Park and 51st, due to street blockage near Hyde Park Blvd/Kimbark.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood Temporary Reroute at Hyde Park Blvd/Kimbark
ShortDescription: 172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via Woodlawn, 47th, Lake Park and 51st, due to street blockage near Hyde Park Blvd/Kimbark.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: #2 Hyde Park Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Hyde Park Blvd/Kimbark
ShortDescription: SB 2 Hyde Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Park, 55th and Cottage Grove, due to street blockage near Hyde Park Blvd/Kimbark.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #2 Hyde Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Park, 55th and Cottage Grove, due to street blockage near Hyde Park Blvd/Kimbark.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Delays on Loop 'L' (elevated lines)
ShortDescription: Green and Orange Line trains are experiencing delays due to signal problems near Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green and Orange Line trains are experiencing delays due to signal problems near Roosevelt.

Crews are working to correct the problem.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem near Montrose. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem near Montrose.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
